question.text: Which statement best describes a core concept in server virtualization related to storage?
question.option: It is managed entirely at the physical hardware level
It enables abstraction and shared resource utilization
It disables isolation between workloads
It works only without a hypervisor
question.explanation: In virtualization, storage resources are abstracted and shared efficiently through the hypervisor.

question.text: Which statement best describes a core concept in server virtualization related to network?
question.option: It is managed entirely at the physical hardware level

It disables isolation between workloads
It works only without a hypervisor
question.explanation: In virtualization, kvm/xen resources are abstracted and shared efficiently through the hypervisor.
